postList.name: Bongbong Marcos
postList.description: The productive meeting with Indian Ambassador Shambhu Kumaran yesterday further reinforced the strong foundations of the Philippine-India bilateral relations. We look forward to learning from their proven methods and technologies in agriculture, digital governance, and medicine manufacturing.

comments.name: Tom Holland
comments.comment: Congratulations to our next 17th President of the Philippines üáµüá≠!

comments.name: Nicola Tesla
comments.comment: This is a very good start to you Sir BBM. You received positive responses from other countries that showed willingness and interest to boost our economy and our friendly relationships with them. Good luck to your endeavors and God is always with you. Stay strong and healthy for you have so much works to begin with.

postList.name: Bongbong Marcos
postList.description: Grateful to Ambassador Koshikawa Kazuhiko for the fruitful discussion on how the Philippines and Japan can work together to further improve our transportation and infrastructure. We look forward to strengthening our trade, investment and security ties, as well as the possibility of increasing employment opportunities for Filipinos in Japan.

postList.name: Bongbong Marcos
postList.description: Do not tie your healing to the hope that someone is going to someday regret what they did to you. Some people do not regret doing you wrong. Some even forgot doing you wrong. Some are unaware of their wrong. Some will never accept that they they did you wrong.

comments.name: Tom Holland
comments.comment: In other words, you do not need to wait for someone's apology as a permission slip to move on and start healing üôèüèΩüåª

comments.name: Bongbong Marcos
comments.comment: Healing is accepting even without hearing an apology üñ§

postList.description: Manila Bay is really beautiful now!

comments.name: Bongbong Marcos
comments.comment: Thanks to the government for conducting rehabilitation
